title: Doctor Suites page, navigation, and SEO updates

requirements.summary: Implement a polished, responsive Doctor Suites page with structured suite details and internal CTAs.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/pages/DoctorsPage.tsx` is no longer empty and renders a complete "Doctor Suites" page.
All user-facing text on the page is in English.
The page uses existing design patterns/components (e.g., `PageHero`, `Section`, `Card`, `Button`) to match the siteâ€™s current look and feel.
The page includes at least one CTA that routes to an existing internal page (e.g., /appointments or /contact).
Layout is responsive (mobile/tablet/desktop) and does not overflow horizontally.

file_operations.description: Implement the full "Doctor Suites" page UI using existing layout components `PageHero` and `Section`, and shadcn-ui components (via `shadcn-ui`) such as `Card` and `Button` to present suites/department name, brief description, hours/availability, and clear CTAs that navigate internally to /appointments and/or /contact (e.g., using TanStack Router navigation). Keep all user-facing text in English and ensure a responsive grid/stack layout without horizontal overflow. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Add router registration and header navigation link for the Doctor Suites page with consistent active styling.
acceptanceCriteria: A new route is added in `frontend/src/App.tsx` for the Doctor Suites page (path and label are consistent across the app).
`frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeader.tsx` includes a new navigation link labeled "Doctor Suites" that navigates to the new route.
The active route styling works consistently with other nav links on both desktop and mobile menus.

file_operations.description: Register the Doctor Suites page route (e.g., path `/doctor-suites`) using the existing TanStack Router pattern: import `DoctorsPage`, create the route, and add it to the `routeTree` so it is reachable like other main pages.

Add a new main navigation item `{ path: '/doctor-suites', label: 'Doctor Suites' }` in the existing `navLinks` list so it appears in both desktop and mobile menus, and relies on the existing active-route variant logic for consistent styling. Uses the existing shadcn-ui `Button` composition (via `shadcn-ui`). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Include Doctor Suites route in SEO metadata config and sitemap so title/description update correctly and crawlers can discover the page.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/config/seo.ts` includes a new `ROUTE_SEO` entry for the Doctor Suites path with an appropriate English title and description.
`frontend/public/sitemap.xml` includes the Doctor Suites URL under the existing `https://mahalaxmi-health-care.icp.page` domain.
After the change, navigating to the Doctor Suites page updates the document title and meta description consistently with other routes (via the existing SEO manager).

file_operations.description: Add a new `ROUTE_SEO` entry keyed by the Doctor Suites route path (matching `App.tsx`, e.g., `/doctor-suites`) with an English title (e.g., "Doctor Suites") and a concise, hospital-quality meta description. This will be picked up automatically by the existing `SeoManager` on navigation.
Add a new `<url>` entry for `https://mahalaxmi-health-care.icp.page/doctor-suites` (path must match routing) with appropriate `changefreq` and `priority`, consistent with existing sitemap entries.
